Text.val: 03.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
06.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
04.10.2007 AK SCR12958 added task 'build BMQ001 PI.TEXT2' + use BMQ001 for MQ's
03.02.2005 EE SCR#7768 extended selection rule ADMN and changed update
05.01.2005 EE SCR#7598 new update rules for V.LCCHFACTACC
08.12.2004 EE SCR#7413 added consistency check
16.04.2004 SCR5436 created by Jin
21.09.2004 JJ SCR7025 Fixed storage type CDPL_LEDGERNO (SQL)
01.09.2004 JJ SCR6929 Arrangements now use distinct CDPL selection
22.04.2004 JJ SCR6062 changed MQHD/DT_HUSRID to blank
13.04.2004 JJ SCR5939 Changed sort getLCCH_balance (to LCCH_ID only)
24/25.03.2004 JJ SCR5793 -restructured program (less DSQL, fetch GNRL subtask)
-added pi.Correct + handling
Arrangements use distinct CDPL selection
Once per administration Fetch ledger numbers (except arrangements)
Arrangements not corrected (multiple ledgers vs. 1 cmon total)!
Set start of line according to line to write
Data Lines 3 to 11
Data Lines 15 to 18 (Inconsistency) (18 is an empty row)
Line 1 header (CMON vs LCCH)
Line 2 header (CMON vs LCCH)
Line 12 header Consistency (empty row)
Line 13 header Consistency
Line 14 header Consistency

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast((lcch_oldbalancec + lcch_amountchangec) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/lcch where lcch_admno = :2 and lcch_clntno = :3 and lcch_ldgr_no = :4 order by lcch_id desc for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
select distinct CDPL_LEDGERNO from :1/CDPL where CDPL_ADMN_NO = :2 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast((lcch_oldbalancec + lcch_amountchangec) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/lcch where lcch_admno = :2 and lcch_clntno = :3 and lcch_ldgr_no = :4 order by lcch_id desc for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
